confirmed_facts: Stray Kids released the album SKZ IT TAPE 'DO IT' on 2025-11-21.
The album sold approximately 295,000 copies in its first week in the U.S.
It debuted at number 1 on the Billboard 200 chart dated 2025-12-06.
This is the group's eighth consecutive Billboard 200 #1, making them the first artist to achieve eight #1s in a row since debut.
The achievement set two new records for the Billboard 200 in 2025.

timeline.event: Release of SKZ IT TAPE 'DO IT'
Billboard preview article announcing the upcoming chart performance
JYP Entertainment announces the album's Billboard 200 #1 debut
Billboard 200 chart dated 2025-12-06 shows 'DO IT' at #1
